title: water_neopet
body:
An alternate color/form of a [[Neopet (creature)|]] that can be applied using a paintbrush or morphing potion.

Water Neopets are teal-colored and appear to be made of water.

h4. External links

* "JellyNeo: Water Neopets":https://wardrobe.jellyneo.net/rainbow-pool/?colour=water

title: valentine_neopet
body:
An alternate color/form of a [[Neopet (creature)|]] that can be applied using a paintbrush.

Valentine Neopets are pink with heart markings.

h4. External links

* "JellyNeo: Valentine Neopets":https://wardrobe.jellyneo.net/rainbow-pool/?colour=valentine

title: transparent_neopet
body:
An alternate color/form of a [[Neopet (creature)|]] that can be applied using a paintbrush or morphing potion.

Transparent Neopets have a see-through body, allowing their internals to be seen.

h4. External links

* "JellyNeo: Transparent Neopets":https://wardrobe.jellyneo.net/rainbow-pool/?colour=transparent

title: striped_neopet
body:
An alternate color/form of a [[Neopet (creature)|]] that can be applied using a paintbrush or morphing potion.

Striped Neopets are light blue with pink stripes.

h4. External links

* "JellyNeo: Striped Neopets":https://wardrobe.jellyneo.net/rainbow-pool/?colour=striped

title: strawberry_neopet
body:
An alternate color/form of a [[Neopet (creature)|]] that can be applied using a paintbrush or morphing potion. Turns the pet into a strawberry [[food-themed creature]].

h4. External links

* "JellyNeo: Strawberry Neopets":https://wardrobe.jellyneo.net/rainbow-pool/?colour=strawberry

title: starry_neopet
body:
An alternate color/form of a [[Neopet (creature)|]] that can be applied using a paintbrush or morphing potion.

Starry Neopets are blue and have yellow star markings.

h4. External links

* "JellyNeo: Starry Neopets":https://wardrobe.jellyneo.net/rainbow-pool/?colour=starry

title: snot_neopet
body:
An alternate color/form of a [[Neopet (creature)|]] that can be applied through zapping a pet with the lab ray.

Snot Neopets are green and made of [[slime (substance)|]].

h4. External links

* "JellyNeo: Snot Neopets":https://wardrobe.jellyneo.net/rainbow-pool/?colour=snot

title: silver_neopet
body:
An alternate color/form of a [[Neopet (creature)|]] that can be applied using a paintbrush or morphing potion.

Turns the Neopet a grey color and gives them a metallic coat.

h4. External links

* "JellyNeo: Silver Neopets":https://wardrobe.jellyneo.net/rainbow-pool/?colour=silver

title: royal_neopet
body:
An alternate color/form of a [[Neopet (creature)|]] that can be applied using a paintbrush or morphing potion.

Has two gendered variants, Royalboy and Royalgirl, which also give the pet royalty-themed clothing in addition to changing their color. Some of the original UC pets were also [[furry|anthropomorphic]].

h4. External links

* "JellyNeo: Royalboy Neopets":https://wardrobe.jellyneo.net/rainbow-pool/?colour=royalboy 
* "JellyNeo: Royalgirl Neopets":https://wardrobe.jellyneo.net/rainbow-pool/?colour=royalgirl

title: rainbow_neopet
body:
An alternate color/form of a [[Neopet (creature)|]] that can be applied using a paintbrush or morphing potion, giving them a bright rainbow-colored coat.

h4. External links

* "JellyNeo: Rainbow Neopets":https://wardrobe.jellyneo.net/rainbow-pool/?colour=rainbow

title: plushie_neopet
body:
An alternate color/form of a [[Neopet (creature)|]] that can be applied using a paintbrush or morphing potion, turning the Neopet into a [[sentient stuffed toy]].

Plushie Neopets often have a multicolored patchwork appearance.

h4. External links

* "JellyNeo: Plushie Neopets":https://wardrobe.jellyneo.net/rainbow-pool/?colour=plushie

title: maraquan_neopet
body:
An alternate color/form of a [[Neopet (creature)|]] that can be applied using a paintbrush or morphing potion.

Maraquan Neopets are aquatic and often have features such as gills or fins, or a mermaid tail. The color is associsted with the Maraqua region.

h4. External links

* "JellyNeo: Maraquan Neopets":https://wardrobe.jellyneo.net/rainbow-pool/?colour=maraquan

title: maractite_neopet
body:
An alternate color/form of a [[Neopet (creature)|]] that can be applied using a paintbrush or morphing potion.

Maractite Neopets appear to be made of Maractite, being a metallic aqua color.

h4. External links

* "JellyNeo: Maractite Neopets":https://wardrobe.jellyneo.net/rainbow-pool/?colour=maractite

title: island_neopet
body:
An alternate color/form of a [[Neopet (creature)|]] that can be applied using a paintbrush or morphing potion.

Island Neopets have yellowish-tan fur and white tribal markings, as well as tribal accessories. The color is associated with the Mystery Island region.

h4. External links

* "JellyNeo: Island Neopets":https://wardrobe.jellyneo.net/rainbow-pool/?colour=island

title: halloween_neopet
body:
An alternate color/form of a [[Neopet (creature)|]] that can be applied using a paintbrush or morphing potion.

h4. External links

* "JellyNeo: Halloween Neopets":https://wardrobe.jellyneo.net/rainbow-pool/?colour=halloween

title: grey_neopet
body:
An alternate color/form of a [[Neopet (creature)|]] that can be applied using a paintbrush or morphing potion.

Aside from the obvious change to a grey color palette, grey Neopets will also appear to be sad or depressed, and often have [[bags under eyes]].

h4. External links

* "JellyNeo: Grey Neopets":https://wardrobe.jellyneo.net/rainbow-pool/?colour=grey
